pullrequest.title: Add countdown feature to common::Timer, expose countdown to TimerGUIPlugin

content.raw:
test passed on [trusty no-gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/292/), but it's failing on [homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/209) (test not yet finished as of this writing, but here's the console output):
~~~
79: [ RUN      ] TimerTest.Timer
79: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo6/gazebo/common/Timer_TEST.cc:41: Failure
79: The difference between elapsed.nsec and 2e8 is 10075000, which exceeds 1e5, where
79: elapsed.nsec evaluates to 210075000,
79: 2e8 evaluates to 200000000, and
79: 1e5 evaluates to 100000.
79: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo6/gazebo/common/Timer_TEST.cc:48: Failure
79: The difference between elapsed.nsec and timer.GetElapsed().nsec is 276000, which exceeds 1e5, where
79: elapsed.nsec evaluates to 210075000,
79: timer.GetElapsed().nsec evaluates to 210351000, and
79: 1e5 evaluates to 100000.
79: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo6/gazebo/common/Timer_TEST.cc:55: Failure
79: The difference between timer.GetElapsed().nsec and 3e8 is 20427000, which exceeds 1e6, where
79: timer.GetElapsed().nsec evaluates to 320427000,
79: 3e8 evaluates to 300000000, and
79: 1e6 evaluates to 1000000.
79: [  FAILED  ] TimerTest.Timer (422 ms)
79: [ RUN      ] TimerTest.CountdownTimer
79: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo6/gazebo/common/Timer_TEST.cc:78: Failure
79: The difference between elapsed.nsec and 8e8 is 2854000, which exceeds 1e5, where
79: elapsed.nsec evaluates to 797146000,
79: 8e8 evaluates to 800000000, and
79: 1e5 evaluates to 100000.
79: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo6/gazebo/common/Timer_TEST.cc:85: Failure
79: The difference between elapsed.nsec and timer.GetElapsed().nsec is 206000, which exceeds 1e5, where
79: elapsed.nsec evaluates to 797146000,
79: timer.GetElapsed().nsec evaluates to 796940000, and
79: 1e5 evaluates to 100000.
79: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo6/gazebo/common/Timer_TEST.cc:92: Failure
79: The difference between timer.GetElapsed().nsec and 7e8 is 4907000, which exceeds 1e6, where
79: timer.GetElapsed().nsec evaluates to 695093000,
79: 7e8 evaluates to 700000000, and
79: 1e6 evaluates to 1000000.
79: [  FAILED  ] TimerTest.CountdownTimer (408 ms)
~~~
